name: cyberdunk
description:
explore huge and mysterious procedurally-generated dungeons while slam-dunking dangerous robots

thats all.

features:
  • fast-pased parkour movement (wall-jumping, dashing, gravity control, etc.)
  • 4 unique guns
  • potion system controlling 8 player characteristics
  • health exchanging
  • bossfight in hell
  • cool graphics
  • bugs
  • a lot of other stuff :)

btw try to collect 5 gems and kill joe or he will murder your entire gaming progress :)
